name: 曾恕銘
objective: 課程主要為介紹人工智慧概念和基本原理，學習DNN/CNN/LSTM的神經網路架構和學習方法，並舉資通訊技術應用實例說明，進而在雲端或非雲端平台實作人工智慧。
schedule:
1.　　Machine Learning and deep learning with labs 9hrs
2.　　Case Study (DNN, post processing): radio resource allocation, 1.5hours
3.　　Case Study (3D CNN, 1-means, self-attention): video coding and scene boundary detection, 3hours
4.　　Bayesian Statistics, 4.5hours
5.　　Decision Tree, 6hours
6.　　knn, K-means, SVM, 3hours
scorePolicy:
Attendance and participation 20%
Lab report 40%
Project 40%
materials:
References: 
Tan, Steinbach, Karpatne, Kumar, Introduction to Data Mining, 2e, 2019
Mendenhall and Sincich, Statistics for engineering and the sciences, 5/e, Prentice Hall.
